sentences.en: A default judgment was issued against the defendant.
sentences.cn: 被告受到了缺席审判.

sentences.en: He lost the tennis match by default.
sentences.cn: 他因不出场而输了网球赛.

sentences.en: He lost the world title by default.
sentences.cn: 他由于弃权而失去了世界冠军的称号.

sentences.en: He was acquitted in default of strong evidence of his guilt.
sentences.cn: 因无确凿证据而判他无罪.

sentences.en: His car was repossessed because of default of monthly installment.
sentences.cn: 因为拖欠按月应付的分期付款,他的汽车被收回了.

sentences.en: How many times must the new format be specified before it becomes the default?
sentences.cn: 一种新格式在成为默认格式之前应该使用多少次?

sentences.en: In System / 38 graphics, the default result of the intersection of two or more colors.
sentences.cn: 在IBMSystem/38图形技术中, 系统将两种或两两种以上颜色合成后的自然结果.

sentences.en: Let's both try not to default on our commitments.
sentences.cn: 让我们双方一起努力,不违反自己的承诺.

sentences.en: Mortgage defaults have risen in the last year.
sentences.cn: 按揭借款违约在近一年里呈上升趋势。

sentences.en: the case against us has gone by default.
sentences.cn: 因为缺少诉方这个案子我方获胜。

sentences.en: the company is already &B{in default on} its loans.
sentences.cn: 该公司因其拖欠贷款已经违约。

sentences.en: The company is in default on the loan.
sentences.cn: 这家公司拖欠借款。

sentences.en: The corporation may be charged with default on its contract with the government.
sentences.cn: 该公司可能会被指控违反了与政府签订的合同。

sentences.en: The credit card business is down, and more borrowers are defaulting on loans.
sentences.cn: 信用卡生意正在走下坡路，更多的借贷人不履行还贷责任。

sentences.en: The creditors haven't declared them in default.
sentences.cn: 债权人尚未宣布他们拖欠债款。

sentences.en: The default is usually the setting that most users would probably choose.
sentences.cn: 默认选项通常是大多数用户都会选择的设置。

sentences.en: The defendant made default yesterday.
sentences.cn: 被告昨天未到庭.

sentences.en: The other team didn't arrive, so our team won by default.
sentences.cn: 由于对方球队未到, 我队以其弃权而获胜.

sentences.en: the risk of default by borrowers
sentences.cn: 借款人不偿还欠款的风险

sentences.en: The same goes for placement of palettes, default tools, frequently used templates, and other useful settings.
sentences.cn: 对于调色板 、 默认工具 、 经常使用的模板设置和其他有用的设置都是同样的道理.

sentences.en: They default ed in the badminton tournament.
sentences.cn: 在羽毛球锦标赛中他们没出场.

sentences.en: to default on a loan/debt
sentences.cn: 拖欠借款 / 债务

words.tran_cn: 缺席者；不履行者；违反军规者
违约；缺席；缺乏；系统默认值
不履行；不参加（比赛等）；对…处以缺席裁判

phrases.tran_cn: 默认路由；[电脑]一路径表格记录
恢复出厂设置；出厂默认值
因缺少，在缺乏…时：因为不足、缺少或缺乏

trans.tran_en: failure to pay money that you owe at the right time
to fail to pay money that you owe at the right time
to fail to pay money that you owe at the right time
failure to pay money that you owe at the right time
